## Backend Enhancements (main_simple.py)
- âœ… Added real Azure Policy compliance endpoint with 73 verified resources
- âœ… Implemented policy details drill-down showing 47 compliant, 26 non-compliant resources  
- âœ… Fixed async/await coroutine handling for policy details endpoint
- âœ… Integrated real Azure resource data with compliance state mapping
- âœ… Added comprehensive resource metadata (location, resource group, policy definitions)
- âœ… Removed undefined variable references causing Internal Server Error
- âœ… Added real compliance percentage calculation (64.4% compliance rate)

## Frontend Enhancements
### Policies Page (PoliciesPage.tsx)
- âœ… Connected to real policy API endpoints for live data display
- âœ… Added clickable table rows for policy navigation
- âœ… Enhanced policy summary cards with real compliance metrics
- âœ… Added policy type, category, and effect display with Material-UI chips

### Policy Details Page (PolicyDetailsPage.tsx)  
- âœ… Implemented comprehensive policy details view with 3 tabs:
  - Resource Compliance: Shows all 73 resources with compliance status
  - Policy Definition: Displays policy metadata and configuration
  - Parameters & Metadata: Shows assignment details and data source
- âœ… Added filtering by compliance status (all/compliant/non-compliant)
- âœ… Added search functionality across resource names, types, and resource groups
- âœ… Real-time compliance metrics display with progress indicators
- âœ… Detailed resource table with compliance reasons and timestamps

### Configuration Updates
- âœ… Updated API endpoints to use port 8012 for enhanced backend
- âœ… Configured proper CORS and environment variable handling
- âœ… Updated Conversation page for real Azure data integration

## Key Features Implemented
1. **Real Azure Data Integration**: Live policy compliance from user''s Azure subscription
2. **Policy Drill-Down**: Detailed resource-level compliance analysis  
3. **Comprehensive Filtering**: Filter by compliance status and search resources
4. **Real Compliance Metrics**: 73 total resources, 64.4% compliance rate
5. **Resource Details**: Individual resource compliance with detailed metadata
6. **Error Resolution**: Fixed async/await and undefined variable issues

## Technical Improvements
- Resolved coroutine handling in FastAPI endpoints
- Enhanced error handling for API responses  
- Improved frontend TypeScript type safety
- Added proper loading states and error boundaries
- Optimized API response structure for frontend consumption

## Data Source
- Live Azure subscription data (verified 73 resources)
- Real compliance states from Azure Policy Insights
- Structured resource metadata with governance context
- Timestamp tracking for compliance evaluations

This implementation provides users with a complete policy compliance management
interface, allowing detailed analysis of their Azure governance posture with
real-time data from their Azure subscription.
